mapper.select: SELECT algh.aseCode ,algh.hospitalId ,algh.patientId ,algh.asemFactor ,algh.asemfCode ,algh.aseName ,algh.aseReaction ,algh.pDoctor ,algh.asedTime ,algh.adminId ,algh.aserDate ,pit.pName FROM allergyh algh JOIN patient pit ON algh.hospitalId = pit.hospitalId AND algh.patientId = pit.patientId WHERE algh.hospitalId = #{session.SID}
SELECT aseCode , hospitalId , patientId , asemFactor , asemfCode , aseName , aseReaction , pDoctor , asedTime , adminId , aserDate FROM allergyh where patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO allergy SELECT aseCode , hospitalId , patientId , asemFactor , asemfCode , aseName , aseReaction , pDoctor , asedTime , adminId , aserDate FROM allergyh WHERE patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.select: SELECT alg.aseCode ,alg.hospitalId ,alg.patientId ,alg.asemFactor ,alg.asemfCode ,alg.aseName ,alg.aseReaction ,alg.pDoctor ,alg.asedTime ,alg.adminId ,alg.aserDate ,pit.pName FROM allergy alg JOIN patient pit ON alg.hospitalId = pit.hospitalId AND alg.patientId = pit.patientId
